mapper.sql: ID, CONSUMER, VERSION, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE
mapper.select: select count(1) from request_verify where CONSUMER=#{consumer,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VERSION=#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into request_verify (ID, CONSUMER, VERSION, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{consumer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update request_verify

UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
